description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability associated with the Windows Mobile Broadband driver (CVE-2024-30003), follow these steps:

1. Identify and install the relevant KB updates for your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: Install **KB5037771**.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Install **KB5037771**.
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: Install **KB5037770**.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: Install **KB5037768**.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: Install **KB5037768**.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64 Systems: Install **KB5037768**.

2. Download the relevant updates from the following links:
   - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)

3. After downloading, double-click the downloaded file to initiate the installation process.

4. Restart your system post-installation to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update specifically addresses an integer overflow vulnerability that could allow remote code execution if exploited.
- Ensure your system is part of the affected Windows versions before proceeding with the updates.
- Always backup critical data before applying any updates to avoid potential data loss.
